job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Services,Information Technology and Services,Health, Wellness and Fitness
job.description: pAt our firm we put a focus on providing a great experience for all our employees supporting in any way possible to allow for our teams to not only enjoy their work but to excel at the same timeppOur mission is focused around using advanced AI solutions to remodel not only how we treat disease but also how we diagnose and prevent it all together In your role as a full stack developer you will assist in the development and support of a range of Healthtech products across the brand with a focus on allowing you to develop your already existing skills and learn entirely new ones The role will involve writing scalable thoroughly tested software working with a crossfunctional team to deliver leading products that have great value to the users ppAs a frontend specialist you will be expected to have extended knowledge of JavascriptTypescript and other modern frameworks developing applications in React and mobile applications in ReactNative Whether you are an expert in these areas already or not we have a focus on helping our software engineers develop these skills in their own ways in a comfortable friendly and leading workplace ppbrppBenefitspulliWhether working in the office or from home we are collaborative and fun proven by our track record of being recognized as a great workplaceliliConsistent time off to relaxliliFlexible working hoursliliAnnual Javascript ES6 and ES7liliSome familiarity with React and a willingness to develop this knowledgeliliAn interest in gaining knowledge in GraphQL and Apollo ClientliliBring more than just technical knowledge caring about the company mission is keyliulpbrppstrongemBuchanan Tech through rapid organic growth is now a market leading tech recruitment firm and a top supplier to a number of clients
